methods.name: numberWithCommas
methods.description: Adds commas to a number every 3 characters

methods.name: string
methods.description: Gets a string in the language of the specified guild.

params.name: guild
params.description: The Guild that should be used for the language

classes.name: EconomyUtility
classes.description: Class for Economy Utilities. This should only be used inside the TaigaClient Class.

methods.name: addCoins
methods.description: Give coins to the specified user

params.name: user
params.description: The user which should get the coins

methods.name: removeCoins
methods.description: Remove coins from the specified user

params.name: user
params.description: The user which should loose the coins

methods.name: getCoins
methods.description: Get coins of the specified user

params.name: user
params.description: The user which should loose the coins

methods.name: daily
methods.description: Give daily rewards to the specified User

params.name: user
params.description: The user which should recieve the daily reward

methods.name: weekly
methods.description: Give weekly rewards to the specified User

params.name: user
params.description: The user which should recieve the weekly reward

methods.name: monthly
methods.description: Give monthly rewards to the specified User

params.name: user
params.description: The user which should recieve the monthly reward

methods.name: validateId
methods.description: Checks if a trading card with the specified id exists.
examples: (TradingCard.validateId(1)) ? console.log("Trading card exists") : console.log("Trading card doesn't exist");

classes.name: Chance
classes.description: A chance for drops of trading cards. If the given value is higher than 100, it will be 100.
